      public static boolean isBetween_EST8AMto10PM​(LocalDate startLocalDate, LocalDateTime start_ldt, LocalDateTime end_ldt)

      startLocalDate - is the LocalDate of the appointment's start date.

      end_ldt - is the LocalDateTime of the appointment's end LocalDateTime.

    • isTheDateTime_betweenThem

      public static boolean isTheDateTime_betweenThem​(Timestamp sql_startDT, Timestamp sql_endDT, LocalDateTime start_ldt, LocalDateTime end_ldt)

      Parameters:
      sql_startDT - is the Timestamp of the appointment's start dateTime from the database.
      sql_endDT - is the Timestamp of the appointment's end dateTime from the database.
      start_ldt - is the LocalDateTime of the appointment's start LocalDateTime.
      end_ldt - is the LocalDateTime of the appointment's end LocalDateTime.
